task.title: Exporting a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Export a pipeline to create a backup or to use the pipeline with another .

context.p: pipelinesexportingWhen you export a pipeline, the generates a JSON file named after the pipeline, as follows: <pipeline name>.json.

step.cmd: From the Home page, click the More icon for the pipeline. Or, in the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the pipeline.

step.stepresult: The console generates the JSON file and saves it to your default downloads directory.
